subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Baylor’s Robert Griffin III might have solidified his spot as the second-most coveted quarterback in the draft with a blazing time in the 40-yard dash at the N.F.L. combine.
snippet: Baylor’s Robert Griffin III might have solidified his spot as the second-most coveted quarterback in the draft with a blazing time in the 40-yard dash at the N.F.L. combine.
